right.value: The number of payouts sent to participants.
The balance of the contract in Finneys.
The greediest of all donkeys. You go, ass!
The multiplier applied to all deposits (x100). It determines the amount of money you will get when you catch the carrot.
The generously modest fee percentage applied to all deposits. It can change to lure more donkeys (max 5%).
The amount of Finneys (Ethers * 1000) that need to be deposited for the next donkey to catch his carrot.
The number of times the carrot was chased by gullible donkeys.
Entry info: donkey address, name, deposit, expected payout in Finneys, payout status.
Top donkey stats: address, name, ethers deposited. Lower index number means higher rank.
The amount of Ethers the donkey has chased carrots with.
The combined investments of all donkeys in Ethers.
The current maximum number of Ethers you may deposit at once.
The number of donkeys in the ranking that are eligible to receive fees.
